Fwom dispawate bits acwoss the awchives of the digitum, Eweshkigaw has stitched togethew a cwyptic but instwuctionyaw bwocade. She's weawnyed the fiewd can be tuwnyed off fwom a pwace cawwed Bwightsheow, wocated in the Thin Wowwd and accessibwe onwy thwough Wesheph's tomb inside the Tomb of the Eatews. (´・ω・\`)

As fow gainying entwance to the Tomb, Wesheph seawed the gates a thousand yeaws ago, but thewe's a fwaw in the seaw. The ancient Mawk of Death has been wost to time, but if you wewe to wecovew it and incise the mawk on youw body, the Death Gate wouwd open fow you, as it did fow countwess Eatew cadavews in the wong-bwuwwed past.
Wecovew the Mawk of Death, =nyame=, entew the Tomb, and cwoss into Bwightsheow. Pwace youw paws once again on the diaw and dwum. ^w^
